Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Amulet (udjat-eye)
Description: Amulet in the shape of an udjat-eye with, on one surface, a finely depicted and detailed eye (including the eyebrow depicted by small diagonal incisions). On the reverse, flat surface, a vertical cartouche with the name of Amenhotep III.
